name: Astroscape
description:
When skill meets puzzle! Embark on this challenging adventure!

It’s 2084,Our space program has discovered 3 abandoned alien bases on a mysterious planet in nearby galaxy.

There are dark, grungy mazes are full of deadly traps. AI sentinels programmed to protect and kill without warning roam the unearthly environment.

Your mission is to get inside, explore and collect all the gold and energy crystals but above all: Return alive.

FEATURES:

- 3 Different Worlds.
- 40 Levels to unlock.
- Highly immersive audio-visual gaming experience.
- 20 unlockable Characters.
- Battle your friends' score with Leaderboard.
- Use your coins to skip a level, get a new hero or buy invincibility shields.
